creator: steve_l@iseran.com
text:
I have a <war> declaration that is referring to some missing stuff. I dont 
know exactly which file I am referencing in my war that is missing, but I do 
know that <war> goes out of its way not to tell me:

Problem creating war: D:\Projects\server\dist\server.war (The system cannot 
find the path specified) (and the archive is probably corrupt but I could not 
delete it)

the error message should detail which file/path is missing

user incompetence. The error was correct (missing dest dir); the fact that 
some of the references inside the declaration were invalid was just 
distracting me.
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
